all-weapons.name: The Blade of your Ancestors
all-weapons.description: This magnificent and clearly magical talking sword is foppish, unreliable and quietly despises you. It taunts your failures and, if continually disappointed, develops a 1 in 6 chance to ‘accidentally’ attack you or your companions. Deals d6+1 damage. Attack/Defence DR is 10.

all-weapons.name: Sacred shepherd’s crook
all-weapons.description: Its head a hook of human bone inscribed with overlapping anti-prayers. This crook hooks through other worlds. Staff does 2d4 damage except to faithless humans.

rows.label: nothing
light armor (tier 1)
medium armor (tier 2)
heavy armor (tier 2)

rows.value: background:A burnt-black building in Sarkash. Your home?
rows.label: A burnt-black building in Sarkash. Your home?

rows.value: background:A derelict rotting ship rolling endlessly across a grey sea.
rows.label: A derelict rotting ship rolling endlessly across a grey sea.

rows.value: background:A brothel in Schleswig. Quite a friendly environment.
rows.label: A brothel in Schleswig. Quite a friendly environment.

rows.value: background:Sleeping with dogs in the corner of an inn, waiting for someone to return.
rows.label: Sleeping with dogs in the corner of an inn, waiting for someone to return.

rows.value: background:Following an army in eastern Wästland.
rows.label: Following an army in eastern Wästland.

rows.value: background:Suckling a wolf in the wild of Bergen Chrypt.
rows.label: Suckling a wolf in the wild of Bergen Chrypt.
Crumpled Monster Mask Strikes primitive fear into lesser creatures like goblins, gnoums and children. While worn, they check Morale every round.

The Brown Scimitar of Galgenbeck A stinking sword you pulled from a military shit-ditch. D6 damage. DR10 attack and defence while you wield it. 1 in 6 chance a wounded enemy is smitten with potent sepsis, dying in 10 minutes.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"_id":"Jh2uzOSivFQmI1gv","name":"Wizard Teeth","type":"equipment","description":"Four weird teeth rattle within a blackened pouch. Before battle roll a d6 for each one. For every 6 one of your attacks deals maximum damage.","equipped":false,"price":0,"quantity":1,"capacity":0,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/wizardteeth.png","effects":[]}}
rows.label: Wizard Teeth Four weird teeth rattle within a blackened pouch. Before battle roll a d6 for each one. For every 6 one of your attacks deals maximum damage.

Old Sigûrd's sling Sigûrd was the strongest man whose throat you ever gnawed. Woven from his long grey hair, this sling has never failed you. 2d4 damage, requires fist-sized rocks which, perhaps regrettably, are everywhere.

rows.value: {"follower":{"_id":"ErBhN8ay6l22MKHH","name":"Ancient Gore-Hound","type":"follower","followerType":"combatant","description":"Asthmatic, deluded and on its last legs, this wizened creature still has a superb nose and can sniffle up treasure in the most disgusting debris. Attacks with DR10 (bite d6). Defends with DR12, 10 HP. Becomes frenzied around goblins and berserkers.","price":null,"quantity":1,"capacity":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/tokens/followers/hound.png","effects":[],"sheet":{"abilities":{"agility":0,"presence":0,"strength":0,"toughness":0},"hp":{"value":10,"max":10},"morale":7,"silver":null,"speciality":"","trait":"","value":"","weapons":[{"_id":"Zus6SwUmNDeXoDtT","name":"Gore-hound Bite","type":"weapon","weaponType":"melee","damageDie":6,"handed":1,"price":0,"equipped":true,"broken":false,"usesAmmo":false,"ammoType":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/followeritems/fangs.png","effects":[],"description":"Attacks with DR10 (bite d6)."}],"armor":{"tier":{"value":1,"max":1}}},"items":[]}}
rows.label: Ancient Gore-Hound Asthmatic, deluded and on its last legs, this wizened creature still has a superb nose and can sniffle up treasure in the most disgusting debris. Attacks with DR10 (bite d6). Defends with DR12, 10 HP. Becomes frenzied around goblins and berserkers.

The Shoe of Death's Horse It looks normal but since finding it in an obscure crypt you are convinced this shoe came from the horse of Death himself. In your hands it hits with DR10, d4 damage. 1 in 6 chance the shoe smashes the skull, instantly killing small-to-medium sized creatures. The shoe returns to your hand like a boomerang.

naturalWeapon.name: Bite attack
effects: You mu st be close to your target. 1-2 on d6 chance the enemy gets a free attack.

rows.value: background:Dumped onto a moving shit-cart still in your birth caul.
rows.label: Dumped onto a moving shit-cart still in your birth caul.

rows.value: background:Mother hanged from a tree outside of Galgenbeck, you fell from the corpse.
rows.label: Mother hanged from a tree outside of Galgenbeck, you fell from the corpse.

rows.value: background:Raised by rats in the gutters of Grift.
rows.label: Raised by rats in the gutters of Grift.

rows.value: background:Kicked and beaten beneath a baker's table in Schleswig.
rows.label: Kicked and beaten beneath a baker's table in Schleswig.
Escaped the Tvelandian orphanarium.

rows.value: background:Educated by outlaws in a hovel south of Alliáns.
rows.label: Educated by outlaws in a hovel south of Alliáns.

rows.value: feature:Coward's Jab When attacking by surprise test Agility DR10. On a success you automatically hit once with a light one-handed weapon, dealing normal damage +3.
rows.label: Coward's Jab When attacking by surprise test Agility DR10. On a success you automatically hit once with a light one-handed weapon, dealing normal damage +3.

rows.value: feature:Filthy Fingersmith Your snaky little digits get into pockets and pick locks with a DR8 Agility test. You also begin with lockpicks!
rows.label: Filthy Fingersmith Your snaky little digits get into pockets and pick locks with a DR8 Agility test. You also begin with lockpicks!

rows.value: feature:Abominable Gob Lobber Your phlegm is viscous, lumpy, vile and ballistically accurate at short range. You can spit d2 times during a fight. Roll a DR8 Presence test for accuracy. Targets are blinded, retching and vomiting for d4 rounds. Anyone witnessing this—friend and foe—must make a Toughness test to not also vomit. PCs test DR10 and enemies DR12.
rows.label: Abominable Gob Lobber Your phlegm is viscous, lumpy, vile and ballistically accurate at short range. You can spit d2 times during a fight. Roll a DR8 Presence test for accuracy. Targets are blinded, retching and vomiting for d4 rounds. Anyone witnessing this—friend and foe—must make a Toughness test to not also vomit. PCs test DR10 and enemies DR12.

rows.value: feature:Escaping Fate Every time you use an omen there is a 50% chance it is not spent.
rows.label: Escaping Fate Every time you use an omen there is a 50% chance it is not spent.

rows.value: feature:Excretal Stealth You have an astounding, almost preternatural ability to hide in muck, debris and filth. When hidden in these conditions a DR16 Presence test is required to notice you.
rows.label: Excretal Stealth You have an astounding, almost preternatural ability to hide in muck, debris and filth. When hidden in these conditions a DR16 Presence test is required to notice you.

rows.value: feature:Dodging Death You are so unpleasant, irrelevant, disgusting and vile even Death would rather avoid you if it can. On death, if there is even the slightest possibility that you survived, there is a 50% chance that you did. If successful, after 10 rounds you pop back up with d4 HP and an unlikely explanation of your escape.
rows.label: Dodging Death You are so unpleasant, irrelevant, disgusting and vile even Death would rather avoid you if it can. On death, if there is even the slightest possibility that you survived, there is a 50% chance that you did. If successful, after 10 rounds you pop back up with d4 HP and an unlikely explanation of your escape.

rows.value: background:Awakening, adult, in a ritual circle underneath the northern bridge to Grift.
rows.label: Awakening, adult, in a ritual circle underneath the northern bridge to Grift.

rows.value: background:Wandered, memoryless, from the mouth of a cavern at the cliffs of Terion.
rows.label: Wandered, memoryless, from the mouth of a cavern at the cliffs of Terion.

rows.value: background:Single child survivor of an incident in the Valley of the Unfortunate Undead.
rows.label: Single child survivor of an incident in the Valley of the Unfortunate Undead.

rows.value: background:Dying of plague in a Bergen Chrypt hovel, you touched something from outside.
rows.label: Dying of plague in a Bergen Chrypt hovel, you touched something from outside.

rows.value: background:An average individual until you encountered something in a dim glade in Sarkash.
rows.label: An average individual until you encountered something in a dim glade in Sarkash.

rows.value: background:Raised on a lonely island in Lake Onda. No one else has ever heard of this island and you can't return.
rows.label: Raised on a lonely island in Lake Onda. No one else has ever heard of this island and you can't return.

rows.value: feature:Master of Fate What use are maps when the substance of causality itself is open to you? You know the right way with a DR8 Presence test.
rows.label: Master of Fate What use are maps when the substance of causality itself is open to you? You know the right way with a DR8 Presence test.

rows.value: feature:A Book of Boiling Blood You may open and read from this book once a day. Your enemy must make a DR12 test to prevent this. If they fail D2 Berserker- slayers appear from the depths of a forgotten dimension of blood. Roll a D6. On a 1-4 these creatures fight alongside you. On a 5-6 they turn on you, attempting to kill you and destroy the book. After the battle they return to their imprisonment.
rows.label: A Book of Boiling Blood You may open and read from this book once a day. Your enemy must make a DR12 test to prevent this. If they fail D2 Berserker- slayers appear from the depths of a forgotten dimension of blood. Roll a D6. On a 1-4 these creatures fight alongside you. On a 5-6 they turn on you, attempting to kill you and destroy the book. After the battle they return to their imprisonment.

rows.value: feature:Speaker of Truths Twice per day use your wisdom, knowledge, advice and inner calm to bring clarity to a creature of your choice. The DR of the next test they undertake is lowered by 4.
rows.label: Speaker of Truths Twice per day use your wisdom, knowledge, advice and inner calm to bring clarity to a creature of your choice. The DR of the next test they undertake is lowered by 4.

rows.value: feature:Initiate of the Invisible College Once per day you may summon D2 scrolls, whose power can be used only once. Roll a d4, on a 1-2 the scrolls are sacred, on a 3-4, unclean. If the scrolls are not used before sunrise they turn to ash.
rows.label: Initiate of the Invisible College Once per day you may summon D2 scrolls, whose power can be used only once. Roll a d4, on a 1-2 the scrolls are sacred, on a 3-4, unclean. If the scrolls are not used before sunrise they turn to ash.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"name":"Bard of the Undying","type":"misc","description":"Bard of the Undying You learnt your melodies in the Otherworld. The music of your Harp gives +D4 on reaction rolls.","equipped":false,"price":0,"quantity":1,"capacity":0,"img":"","effects":[],"_id":"s5IPLLQcYedhA5mI"}}
rows.label: Bard of the Undying You learnt your melodies in the Otherworld. The music of your Harp gives +D4 on reaction rolls.

rows.value: {"follower":{"_id":"d6pGFaOVukoH4bpB","name":"Hawk as weapon","type":"follower","followeType":"combatant","description":"Your crafty almost-intelligent hawk is loyal only to you. Even without shared language, you understand its cries as it keeps watch, scouts and swoops to attack foes. Attacks/ defence DR10 (claws/bite D4), HP 8.","price":null,"quantity":1,"capacity":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/tokens/followers/hawk.png","effects":[],"sheet":{"attack":"DR10","defense":"DR10","abilities":{"agility":0,"presence":0,"strength":0,"toughness":0},"hp":{"value":8,"max":8},"morale":7,"silver":null,"speciality":"","trait":"","value":"","weapons":[{"_id":"WdnKKXEwOX5HFTfx","name":"Hawk Talons","type":"weapon","weaponType":"melee","damageDie":4,"handed":2,"price":0,"equipped":true,"broken":false,"usesAmmo":false,"ammoType":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/followeritems/fangs.png","effects":[]}],"armor":{"tier":{"value":0,"max":0}}},"items":[]}}
rows.label: Hawk as weapon Your crafty almost-intelligent hawk is loyal only to you. Even without shared language, you understand its cries as it keeps watch, scouts and swoops to attack foes. Attacks/defence DR10 (claws/bite D4), HP 8.

origin.title: Things were going so well, until…

rows.value: background:your Wästland palace was reduced to rubble.
rows.label: your Wästland palace was reduced to rubble.

rows.value: background:your caravan kingdom of Tveland fell into penury.
rows.label: your caravan kingdom of Tveland fell into penury.

rows.value: background:King Fathmu IX's brother Zigmund, your father, was murdered.
rows.label: King Fathmu IX's brother Zigmund, your father, was murdered.

rows.value: background:the southern empire of Südglans sank into the sea.
rows.label: the southern empire of Südglans sank into the sea.

rows.value: background:Anthelia demanded a gift of noble blood.
rows.label: Anthelia demanded a gift of noble blood.

rows.value: background:two young princes were kidnapped west of Bergen Chrypt and disappeared into the black crevasse of the eastern slopes.
rows.label: two young princes were kidnapped west of Bergen Chrypt and disappeared into the black crevasse of the eastern slopes.

It taunts your failures and, if continually disappointed, develops a 1 in 6 chance to ‘accidentally’ attack you or your companions. Deals d6+1 damage. Attack/Defence DR is 10.","damageDie":"1d6+1","handed":1,"price":0,"equipped":false,"broken":false,"usesAmmo":false,"ammoType":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/bladeofyourancestors.png","effects":[{"toHit":"DR10"},{"defence":"DR10"}]}}
rows.label: The Blade of your Ancestors This magnificent and clearly magical talking sword is foppish, unreliable and quietly despises you. It taunts your failures and, if continually disappointed, develops a 1 in 6 chance to ‘accidentally' attack you or your companions. Deals d6+1 damage. Attack/Defence DR is 10.

rows.value: {"follower":{"_id":"pNlrszU8gNi2VYWn","name":"Poltroon the Court Jester","type":"follower","followerType":"buffer","description":"While practically useless, personally irritating and an emotional drain, Poltroon’s capering actually makes enemies lose their focus in combat. For the first two rounds you and your allies get +2 on attack/defence.","price":null,"quantity":1,"capacity":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/tokens/followers/jester.png","effects":["possibly buff effect here"],"sheet":{"abilities":{"agility":0,"presence":0,"strength":0,"toughness":0},"hp":{"max":8,"value":8},"morale":7,"silver":0,"speciality":"","trait":"","value":""},"items":[]}}
rows.label: ‘Poltroon' the Court Jester While practically useless, personally irritating and an emotional drain, Poltroon's capering actually makes enemies lose their focus in combat. For the first two rounds you and your allies get +2 on attack/defence.

rows.value: {"follower":{"_id":"0bddHriOAq9fEstq","name":"Barbarister the Incredible Horse","type":"follower","followerType":"buffer","description":"Barbarister is magical, intelligent, arrogant and vain. He can also talk. If you can persuade him to care, Barbarister occasionally adds +2 to Presence tests involving logic and intellect. The horse may be smarter than you and is quite aware of this.","price":null,"quantity":1,"capacity":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/tokens/followers/barbarister_bw.png","effects":["possibly buff effect here"],"sheet":{"abilities":{"agility":0,"presence":0,"strength":0,"toughness":0},"hp":{"max":8,"value":8},"morale":7,"silver":0,"speciality":"","trait":"","value":""},"items":[]}}
rows.label: Barbarister the Incredible Horse Barbarister is magical, intelligent, arrogant and vain. He can also talk. If you can persuade him to care, Barbarister occasionally adds +2 to Presence tests involving logic and intellect. The horse may be smarter than you and is quite aware of this.

rows.value: {"follower":{"_id":"XRGIHRqjF2sxHOnw","name":"Hamfund the Squire","type":"follower","followerType":"buffer","description":"This intensely cowardly servant acts only as guardian for the scabbard of the cursed sword Eurekia. Once per combat, if Ham can be found, Eurekia may be drawn. The sword does 2d6 damage, and for every swing of Eurekia roll a d6. On a 1 the squire is slain and Eurekia vanishes forever.","price":null,"quantity":1,"capacity":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/hamfund.png","effects":["possibly buff effect here"],"sheet":{"abilities":{"agility":0,"presence":0,"strength":0,"toughness":0},"hp":{"max":8,"value":8},"morale":7,"silver":0,"speciality":"","trait":"","value":""},"items":[]}}
rows.label: Hamfund the Squire This intensely cowardly servant acts only as guardian for the scabbard of the cursed sword Eurekia. Once per combat, if Ham can be found, Eurekia may be drawn. The sword does 2d6 damage, and for every swing of Eurekia roll a d6. On a 1 the squire is slain and Eurekia vanishes forever.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"name":"The Snake-Skin Gift","type":"container","description":"An expensive sandalwood box bound in snakeskin. It contains a seemingly ordinary dagger, wrapped in silk. The dagger does d4 damage but on a 1 the target dies immediately of deadly poison weeping from the blade.","equipped":false,"price":6,"quantity":1,"capacity":7,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/snakeskingift.png","effects":[],"_id":"2WFqsHRF4UuaJ3X2"}}
rows.label: The Snake-Skin Gift An expensive sandalwood box bound in snakeskin. It contains a seemingly ordinary dagger, wrapped in silk. The dagger does d4 damage but on a 1 the target dies immediately of deadly poison weeping from the blade.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"name":"Horn of the Schleswig Lords!","type":"misc","description":"Once per day release a blare from this dented old trumpet and test Presence DR12. One creature may make their next non-combat test an automatic success.","equipped":false,"price":0,"quantity":1,"capacity":0,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/trumpet.png","effects":[],"_id":"3Q5h6hShVlzykRzG"}}
rows.label: Horn of the Schleswig Lords! Once per day release a blare from this dented old trumpet and test Presence DR12. One creature may make their next non-combat test an automatic success.

rows.value: background:Galgenbeck, near the cathedral of the Two-Headed Basilisks.
rows.label: Galgenbeck, near the cathedral of the Two-Headed Basilisks.
Massacred Alliáns cult, sole survivor.
The crypts of Grift.

rows.value: background:Temple ruins in the Valley of the Unfortunate Undead.
rows.label: Temple ruins in the Valley of the Unfortunate Undead.

rows.value: background:One of the many Graven-Tosk thief-tunnels.
rows.label: One of the many Graven-Tosk thief-tunnels.
Secret Bergen Chrypt church.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"_id":"OzdhtFbwwJNMk1py","name":"Sacred shepherd's crook","type":"weapon","weaponType":"melee","description":"Its head a hook of human bone inscribed with overlapping anti-prayers. This crook hooks through other worlds. Staff does 2d4 damage except to faithless humans.","damageDie":"2d4","handed":2,"price":0,"equipped":false,"broken":false,"usesAmmo":false,"ammoType":null,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/shepherds-crook.png","effects":[{"toHit":"DR10"},{"defence":"DR10"}]}}
rows.label: Sacred shepherd's crook Its head a hook of human bone inscribed with overlapping anti-prayers. This crook hooks through other worlds. Staff does 2d4 damage except to faithless humans.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"name":"Stolen Mitre","type":"misc","description":"While wearing this holy hat the priest's vile body fades, becoming hard to hit in combat (Defense DR10). If pulled over the ears outside of battle the priest becomes nearly invisible, testing stealth against DR8.","equipped":false,"price":0,"quantity":1,"capacity":0,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/mitre.png","effects":[{"toHit":"DR10"},{"stealth":"DR8"}],"_id":"hhCP0wkVWMjXjLGi"}}
rows.label: Stolen Mitre While wearing this holy hat the priest's vile body fades, becoming hard to hit in combat (Defence DR10). If pulled over the ears outside of battle the priest becomes nearly invisible, testing stealth against DR8.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"name":"List of Sins","type":"misc","description":"A long and accurate document cross-referenced against reality to discover unseen evil-doers. Successful Presence DR10: A strange light surrounds evil creatures. The list's owner defends with +2 against any being discovered this way.","equipped":false,"price":0,"quantity":1,"capacity":0,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/listofsins.png","effects":[],"_id":"tmBvT2Xa23nKQJXE"}}
rows.label: List of Sins A long and accurate document cross-referenced against reality to discover unseen evil-doers. Successful Presence DR10: A strange light surrounds evil creatures. The list's owner defends with +2 against any being discovered this way.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"name":"The Blasphemous Nechrubel Bible","type":"misc","description":"So intensely blasphemous even the Priests themselves can only peruse it once per day. When read, roll a die. \nEven result: For the rest of the day PCs heal d4 HP after just five minutes of rest.\nOdd result: The priest is plagued by demon hallucinations. The DM may invent d3 things that only the Priest can see and describe them to the player as if true. This effect ends with sunrise.","equipped":false,"price":0,"quantity":1,"capacity":0,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/blasphemousbible.png","effects":[],"_id":"lmjtliPXdk0u2zW6"}}
rows.label: The Blasphemous Nechrubel Bible So intensely blasphemous even the Priests themselves can only peruse it once per day. When read, roll a die. Even result: For the rest of the day PCs heal d4 HP after just five minutes of rest. Odd result: The priest is plagued by demonic hallucinations. The DM may invent d3 things that only the Priest can see and describe them to the player as if true. This effect ends with sunrise

rows.value: {"equipment":{"name":"Stones taken from Thel-Emas' Lost Temple","type":"misc","description":"Cast the stones on the ground. Their pattern reveals if danger lurks in an adjacent room. The stones can lie. The priest tests Presence DR10 to see if they are true but after failing they cannot test again until the sun has set.","equipped":false,"price":0,"quantity":1,"capacity":0,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/stones.png","effects":[],"_id":"Q5EckLsZNjsNVLc6"}}
rows.label: Stones taken from Thel-Emas' Lost Temple Cast the stones on the ground. Their pattern reveals if danger lurks in an adjacent room. The stones can lie. The priest tests Presence DR10 to see if they are true but after failing they cannot test again until the sun has set.

rows.value: {"equipment":{"name":"(MʁOИҼ ՂEƧꓵƧ) CRUCIFIX","type":"misc","description":"The crucifix can be used in encounters with the undead as we as lesser trolls and goblins. Check morale (add or subtract the priest's Presence modifier) to see if the creatures bow and kindly remove themselves.","equipped":false,"price":0,"quantity":1,"capacity":0,"img":"systems/morkborg/icons/classitems/wrong-crucifix.png","effects":[],"_id":"s7IPLLQcYedhA7mI"}}
rows.label: 666 (MʁOИҼ ՂEƧꓵƧ) CRUCIFIX The crucifix can be used in encounters with the undead as well as lesser trolls and goblins. Check morale (add or subtract the priest's Presence modifier) to see if the creatures bow and kindly remove themselves.

rows.value: background:calm isolation in the Sarkash dark.
rows.label: calm isolation in the Sarkash dark.

rows.value: background:the illegal midnight markets of Schleswig.
rows.label: the illegal midnight markets of Schleswig.

rows.value: background:the heretic isle of Crëlut, two nautical miles east of Grift.
rows.label: the heretic isle of Crëlut, two nautical miles east of Grift.

rows.value: background:the old frozen ruins not far from Alliáns.
rows.label: the old frozen ruins not far from Alliáns.

rows.value: background:a little witches cottage in Galgenbeck.
rows.label: a little witches cottage in Galgenbeck.

rows.value: background:the ruins of the Shadow King's manse, thick with memories of mushrooms and smoke.
rows.label: the ruins of the Shadow King's manse, thick with memories of mushrooms and smoke.

equipment.name: Backpack
equipment.description: Holds 7 normal-sized items.

equipment.name: Bear trap
equipment.description: Presence DR14 to spot, d8 damage.

equipment.name: Caltrops
equipment.description: d4 damage + infection on 1 in 6.

equipment.name: Dried food
equipment.description: 1 day.

equipment.name: Heavy chain
equipment.description: 15 feet.

equipment.name: Iron nails
equipment.description: 10 nails.

equipment.name: Lantern oil
equipment.description: Presence + 6 hours.

equipment.name: Lard
equipment.description: May function as # meals.

equipment.name: Lockpicks
equipment.description: Metal File and Lockpicks

equipment.name: Medicine box
equipment.description: Stops bleeding/infection and +d6 HP. Presence + 4 uses.

equipment.name: Poison (Black)
equipment.description: Toughness DR14 or d6 damage + blind for one hour. 3 doses.

equipment.name: Poison (Red)
equipment.description: Toughness DR12 or d10 damage. 3 doses.

equipment.name: Rope
equipment.description: 30 feet.

equipment.name: Toolbox
equipment.description: 10 nails, hammer, small saw, tongs.

equipment.name: Sack
equipment.description: Holds 10 normal-sized items.

equipment.name: Waterskin
equipment.description: 4 days of water.

equipment.name: Bomb
equipment.description: Sealed bottle, d10 damage.

equipment.name: Life Elixir
equipment.description: d4 doses (heals d6 HP and removes infection)

equipment.name: Crumpled Monster Mask
equipment.description: Scares things

equipment.name: Wizard Teeth
equipment.description: Four weird teeth rattle within a blackened pouch. Before battle roll a d6 for each one. For every 6 one of your attacks deals maximum damage.

equipment.name: The Snake-Skin Gift
equipment.description: An expensive sandalwood box bound in snakeskin. It contains a seemingly ordinary dagger, wrapped in silk. The dagger does d4 damage but on a 1 the target dies immediately of deadly poison weeping from the blade.

equipment.name: Horn of the Schleswig Lords!
equipment.description: Once per day release a blare from this dented old trumpet and test Presence DR12. One creature may make their next non-combat test an automatic success.

equipment.name: Stolen Mitre
equipment.description: While wearing this holy hat the priest's vile body fades, becoming hard to hit in combat (Defense DR10). If pulled over the ears outside of battle the priest becomes nearly invisible, testing stealth against DR8.

equipment.name: List of Sins
equipment.description: A long and accurate document cross-referenced against reality to discover unseen evil-doers. Successful Presence DR10: A strange light surrounds evil creatures. The list's owner defends with +2 against any being discovered this way.

equipment.name: The Blasphemous Nechrubel Bible
Stones taken from Thel-Emas' Lost Temple
equipment.description: Cast the stones on the ground. Their pattern reveals if danger lurks in an adjacent room. The stones can lie. The priest tests Presence DR10 to see if they are true but after failing they cannot test again until the sun has set.

equipment.name: (MʁOИҼ ՂEƧꓵƧ) CRUCIFIX
equipment.description: The crucifix can be used in encounters with the undead as we as lesser trolls and goblins. Check morale (add or subtract the priest's Presence modifier) to see if the creatures bow and kindly remove themselves.

equipment.description: Bard of the Undying You learnt your melodies in the Otherworld. The music of your Harp gives +D4 on reaction rolls.

followers.name: Barbarister the Incredible Horse
followers.description: Barbarister is magical, intelligent, arrogant and vain. He can also talk. If you can persuade him to care, Barbarister occasionally adds +2 to Presence tests involving logic and intellect. The horse may be smarter than you and is quite aware of this.

followers.name: Monkey
followers.description: d4 monkeys that ignore but love you (d4+2 HP, punch/bite d4).

followers.name: Ancient Gore-Hound
followers.description: Asthmatic, deluded and on its last legs, this wizened creature still has a superb nose and can sniffle up treasure in the most disgusting debris. Attacks with DR10 (bite d6). Defends with DR12, 10 HP. Becomes frenzied around goblins and berserkers.

followers.name: Small but vicious dog
followers.description: d6+2 HP,  bite d4,  only obeys you.

followers.name: Hawk as weapon
followers.description: Your crafty almost-intelligent hawk is loyal only to you. Even without shared language, you understand its cries as it keeps watch, scouts and swoops to attack foes. Attacks/ defence DR10 (claws/bite D4), HP 8.

followers.name: Poltroon the Court Jester
followers.description: While practically useless, personally irritating and an emotional drain, Poltroon’s capering actually makes enemies lose their focus in combat. For the first two rounds you and your allies get +2 on attack/defence.

followers.name: Hamfund the Squire
followers.description: This intensely cowardly servant acts only as guardian for the scabbard of the cursed sword Eurekia. Once per combat, if Ham can be found, Eurekia may be drawn. The sword does 2d6 damage, and for every swing of Eurekia roll a d6. On a 1 the squire is slain and Eurekia vanishes forever.

scrolls_sacred.name: Grace of a Dead Saint
scrolls_sacred.description: d2 creatures regain d10 HP each.

scrolls_sacred.name: Grace for a Sinner
scrolls_sacred.description: A creature of your choice gets +d6 on one roll (damage, test, etc).

scrolls_sacred.name: Whispers Pass the Gate
scrolls_sacred.description: Ask three questions to a deceased creature.

scrolls_sacred.name: Aegis of Sorrow
scrolls_sacred.description: A creature of your choice gains 2d6 extra HP for 10 rounds.

scrolls_sacred.name: Unmet Fate
scrolls_sacred.description: One creature, dead for no more than a week, is awakened with terrible memories.

scrolls_sacred.name: Bestial Speech
scrolls_sacred.description: You may speak with animals for d20 minutes.

scrolls_sacred.name: False Dawn / Night's Chariot
scrolls_sacred.description: Light or pitch black for 3d10 minutes.

scrolls_sacred.name: Hermetic Step
scrolls_sacred.description: You find all traps in your path for 2d10 minutes.

scrolls_sacred.name: Roskoe's Consuming Glare
scrolls_sacred.description: d4 creatures lose d8 HP each.

scrolls_sacred.name: Enochian Syntax
scrolls_sacred.description: One creature blindly obeys a single command.

scrolls_unclean.name: Palms Open the Southern Gate
scrolls_unclean.description: A ball of fire hits d2 creatures dealing d8 damage per creature.

scrolls_unclean.name: Tongue of Eris
scrolls_unclean.description: A creature of your choice is confused for 10 minutes.

scrolls_unclean.name: Te-le-kin-esis
scrolls_unclean.description: Move an object up to 1d10x10 feet for d6 minutes.

scrolls_unclean.name: Daemon of Capillaries
scrolls_unclean.description: One creature suffocates for d6 rounds, losing d4 HP per round.

scrolls_unclean.name: Nine Violet Signs Unknot the Storm
scrolls_unclean.description: Produce d2 lightning bolts dealing d6 damage each.

scrolls_unclean.name: Metzhuotl Blind Your Eye
scrolls_unclean.description: A creature becomes invisible for d6 rounds or until it is damaged, attacking/defending with DR6.

scrolls_unclean.name: Eyelid Blinds the Mind
scrolls_unclean.description: d5 creatures fall asleep for one hour unless they succeed a DR14 test.

scrolls_unclean.name: Death
scrolls_unclean.description: All creatures within 30 feet lose a total of 4d10 HP.

rows.label: Obsessively collect small sharp stones.

rows.value: Won't use a blade without testing it on your own flesh. Arms knitted with scars.
rows.label: Won't use a blade without testing it on your own flesh. Arms knitted with scars.

rows.value: Can't start drinking once you start.
rows.label: Can't start drinking once you start.

rows.value: Gambling addict. Must bet every day. If yopu lose raise and bet again
rows.label: Gambling addict. Must bet every day. If yopu lose raise and bet again

rows.value: Cannot tolerate criticism of any kind, Results in rage and weeping.
rows.label: Cannot tolerate criticism of any kind, Results in rage and weeping.

rows.value: Unable to get to the point. Have never actually finished a story.
rows.label: Unable to get to the point. Have never actually finished a story.

rows.value: Best friend is a skull. Carry it with you, tell it everything, you trust no one more.
rows.label: Best friend is a skull. Carry it with you, tell it everything, you trust no one more.

rows.value: You pick your nose so deep it bleeds.
rows.label: You pick your nose so deep it bleeds.

rows.value: Laugh hysterically at your own jokes which you then explain in detail.
rows.label: Laugh hysterically at your own jokes which you then explain in detail.

rows.value: A nihilist. You insist on telling everyone you're a nihilist and explaining why.
rows.label: A nihilist. You insist on telling everyone you're a nihilist and explaining why.
Inveterate bug eater.

rows.value: Stress response is aesthetic display. The worse things get the fancier you need to be.
rows.label: Stress response is aesthetic display. The worse things get the fancier you need to be.

rows.value: Permanent phegm deposit in throat. Continuously cough, snort, spit and swallow.
rows.label: Permanent phegm deposit in throat. Continuously cough, snort, spit and swallow.
Pyromanniac

rows.value: Consistently lose important items and forget vital facts.
rows.label: Consistently lose important items and forget vital facts.

rows.value: Insecure shit-stirrer. Will talk about whoever just left the room.
rows.label: Insecure shit-stirrer. Will talk about whoever just left the room.
You stutter when lying.

rows.value: You giggle insanely at the worst possible times.
rows.label: You giggle insanely at the worst possible times.

rows.value: You whisle while trying to hide. You will deny this. Whistle when 5, 7, 9, 11 or 13 is rolled ona d20.
rows.label: You whisle while trying to hide. You will deny this. Whistle when 5, 7, 9, 11 or 13 is rolled ona d20.

rows.value: You make jewelry from the teeth of the dead.
rows.label: You make jewelry from the teeth of the dead.
Staring Manic Gaze

Hauntingly beautify, unnervingly clean

rows.value: Cataracts slowly but surely spreading in both eyes
rows.label: Cataracts slowly but surely spreading in both eyes

rows.value: Long tangled hair, at least one cockroach in residence
rows.label: Long tangled hair, at least one cockroach in residence

rows.value: Juddering and studttering from nerve damage or stress
rows.label: Juddering and studttering from nerve damage or stress
